tool.name: OTB.VectorDataDSValidation
tool.description: Vector data validation based on the fusion of features using Dempster-Shafer evidence theory framework.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False isArraydescmod False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.VectorDataDSValidation in $in descmod $descmod belsup '$belsup' plasup '$plasup' cri '$cri' thd $thd prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: in
param.label: Input vector data to validate
param.help: Input vector data to validate The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, zip, json, xml

param.name: descmod
param.label: Fuzzy descriptors model (xml file)
param.help: Fuzzy descriptors model (xml file) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: belsup
param.label: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute belief
param.help: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute belief

param.name: plasup
param.label: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute plausibility
param.help: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute plausibility

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Output VectorData containing only the validated samples
param.help: Output VectorData containing only the validated samples

tool.help: This application validates or unvalidate the studied samples using the Dempster-Shafer theory.
